<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="background-color: white; background-position: initial initial; background-repeat: initial initial;"><br></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="background-color: white; background-position: initial initial; background-repeat: initial initial;"><span style="color: rgb(62, 62, 62); background-color: white; font-size: 16pt;"><font face="Helvetica Neue, sans-serif">      </font></span><span style="color: rgb(62, 62, 62); background-color: white; font-size: 16pt; font-family: 宋体;">负载均衡在服务端开发中算是一个比较重要的特性。因为</span><span lang="EN-US" style="color: rgb(62, 62, 62); background-color: white; font-size: 16pt; font-family: 'Helvetica Neue', sans-serif;">Nginx</span><span style="color: rgb(62, 62, 62); background-color: white; font-size: 16pt; font-family: 宋体;">除了作为常规的</span><span lang="EN-US" style="color: rgb(62, 62, 62); background-color: white; font-size: 16pt; font-family: 'Helvetica Neue', sans-serif;">Web</span><span style="color: rgb(62, 62, 62); background-color: white; font-size: 16pt; font-family: 宋体;">服务器外，还会被大规模的用于反向代理前端，因为</span><span lang="EN-US" style="color: rgb(62, 62, 62); background-color: white; font-size: 16pt; font-family: 'Helvetica Neue', sans-serif;">Nginx</span><span style="color: rgb(62, 62, 62); background-color: white; font-size: 16pt; font-family: 宋体;">的异步框架可以处理很大的并发请求，把这些并发请求</span><span lang="EN-US" style="color: rgb(62, 62, 62); background-color: white; font-size: 16pt; font-family: 'Helvetica Neue', sans-serif;">hold</span><span style="color: rgb(62, 62, 62); background-color: white; font-size: 16pt; font-family: 宋体;">住之后就可以分发给后台服务端</span><span lang="EN-US" style="color: rgb(62, 62, 62); background-color: white; font-size: 16pt; font-family: 'Helvetica Neue', sans-serif;">(backend servers</span><span style="color: rgb(62, 62, 62); background-color: white; font-size: 16pt; font-family: 宋体;">，也叫做服务池，</span><span style="color: rgb(62, 62, 62); background-color: white; font-size: 16pt; font-family: 'Helvetica Neue', sans-serif;"> </span><span style="color: rgb(62, 62, 62); background-color: white; font-size: 16pt; font-family: 宋体;">后面简称</span><span lang="EN-US" style="color: rgb(62, 62, 62); background-color: white; font-size: 16pt; font-family: 'Helvetica Neue', sans-serif;">backend)</span><span style="color: rgb(62, 62, 62); background-color: white; font-size: 16pt; font-family: 宋体;">来做复杂的计算、处理和响应，这种模式的好处是相当多的：隐藏业务主机更安全，节约了公网</span><span lang="EN-US" style="color: rgb(62, 62, 62); background-color: white; font-size: 16pt; font-family: 'Helvetica Neue', sans-serif;">IP</span><span style="color: rgb(62, 62, 62); background-color: white; font-size: 16pt; font-family: 宋体;">地址，并且在业务量增加的时候可以方便地扩容后台服务器。</span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="background-color: white; background-position: initial initial; background-repeat: initial initial;"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#3E3E3E;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><br>
</span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#3E3E3E;
mso-font-kerning:0pt">负载均衡可以分为硬件负载均衡和软件负载均衡，前者一般是专用的软件和硬件相结合的设备，设备商会提供完整成熟的解决方案，通常也会更加昂贵。软件的复杂均衡以</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#3E3E3E;mso-font-kerning:0pt">Nginx</span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#3E3E3E;
mso-font-kerning:0pt">占据绝大多数，本文也是基于其手册做相应的学习研究的。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:#3E3E3E;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="background-color: white; background-position: initial initial; background-repeat: initial initial;"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#3E3E3E;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><o:p> </o:p></span></p>
